columns.name: name
columns.description: The descriptive name of the rule group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule group.

columns.name: firewall_policy_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the firewall policy.

columns.name: consumed_stateful_rule_capacity
columns.description: The number of capacity units currently consumed by the policy's stateful rules.

columns.name: consumed_stateless_rule_capacity
columns.description: The number of capacity units currently consumed by the policy's stateless rules.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the firewall policy.

columns.name: firewall_policy_status
columns.description: The current status of the firewall policy.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: The last time that the firewall policy was changed.

columns.name: number_of_associations
columns.description: The number of firewall policies that use this rule group.

columns.name: encryption_configuration
columns.description: A complex type that contains the Amazon Web Services KMS encryption configuration settings for your firewall policy.

columns.name: firewall_policy
columns.description: The policy for the specified firewall policy.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the resource.
